title: Drawing, "International Tea Party", ca. 1867
medium: Graphite, brush and black and gray wash on paper
creditline: Gift of Charles Savage Homer, Jr.
description: Horizontal view of four figures; two orientals, and two caucasians dressed in clothing symbolical of the United States, sitting on mats and drinking tea from handled cups.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "International Tea Party", ca. 1867.
ca. 1867. Graphite, brush and black and gray wash on paper. Gift of Charles Savage Homer, Jr.. 1912-12-269.
